Verkada offers six product lines - video security cameras, access control, environmental sensors, alarms, workplace and intercoms - integrated with a single cloud-based software platform. Designed with simplicity and scalability in mind, Verkada gives organizations the real-time insight to know what could impact the safety and comfort of people throughout their physical environment, while empowering them to take immediate action to minimize security risks, workplace frustrations and costly inefficiencies. Founded in 2016 with more than $460M in funding raised to date, Verkada has expanded rapidly with 15 offices across three continents, 2,100+ full-time employees and 28,000+ customers across 70+ countries. The Role Verkada is looking for a Mobile Software Engineering intern to join our team for an exciting and challenging internship. As part of a new product team, you will collaborate cross functionally to enable a native mobile experience in both our existing and new iOS and Android applications, enabling our best-in-class security systems. Learn more about Verkada from one of our interns - Gary Ye from University of Waterloo!
